title: Welcome to FestStack
appDescription: Your all-in-one platform to manage festivals, events, and communities ‚Äî designed for speed and flexibility.
about_intro: FestStack is an all-in-one platform designed to simplify the management of festivals, events, and cultural communities. Whether you're an event organizer, a member of an association, or a ticketing manager, FestStack supports you at every stage, from planning to post-event review.
about_goal_text: Our mission is to make event management smooth, collaborative, and efficient, without requiring technical skills. With a modern and intuitive interface, you can manage multiple aspects of your projects from one place.
about_features_list: Team creation and role assignment via AD (Active Directory) integration
User tracking and access rights management
Support for registration forms, ticketing, and logistics
about_tech_text: FestStack is built with Next.js for performance, Tailwind CSS for a responsive and modern interface, and Prisma + MySQL for data management_ Authentication is handled via GitHub and the admin interface is highly customizable.
about_multilang_text: FestStack is designed for an international audience. The app supports multiple languages (English, French, Spanish, German) and allows users to dynamically switch the display language.
about_security_text: Data security is a top priority. Each user has access strictly defined by AD groups, and all communications are encrypted. The interface is also designed to be accessible to all user profiles.
about_evolution_text: We actively listen to our user community to evolve FestStack based on real-world needs. Many features are already in development, including a public API, offline mode, and integration with external tools (calendars, CRMs, payment solutions...).
about_cta: Join the event revolution with FestStack.
